properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vyadhi badhalu kaligina viduvavu nannennadu, Sramayu sodhana vaccina viduvavu nannennadu, Apada kalamulo nannu adarinci kacedavu, Ennadu viduvavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Na tallidandrulu vidacina viduvavu nannennadu, Bandhumitrulu dvesincina viduvavu nannennadu, Sasvatamaina premato nannu preminci na prabhu, Viduvaka krpa cupedavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
